title: Marcos has committed more grievous crimes than those prohibitions in the Libingan ng mga Bayani Interment policy
content:
Those prohibitions were put in place to help ensure only honorable persons be buried. Given he has done more grievous acts than those prohibitions, he therefore falls under the prohibitions and is legally prohibited to be buried.
